FuncDef: The display nat bandwidth command displays the bandwidth specified in the license file.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the slot ID of a VSUF.
The value is a string of 1 to 15 case-sensitive characters, spaces not supported.

Examples: SlotID  CpuID      BasicBandwidth  CfgBandwidth  Total  ValidFlag
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To view the bandwidth specified in the license file, run the display nat bandwidth command.
Precautions
This command is supported only on the admin VS.
This command is applicable only to the VSUF-80/VSUF-160/VSUI-160-E/VSUI-400/VSUI-400-E/VSUI-400A/VSUI-400A-E/VSUI-400-S/VSUI-400A-S.
TotalLicenseSize indicates the total license bandwidth, and UsedLicenseSize indicates the actual bandwidth being used by a device. When a license is changed or becomes invalid or insufficient, the device does not check the license bandwidth and instead uses the command activated license to ensure service continuity. As such, the value of UsedLicenseSize may be greater than the value of TotalLicenseSize.
